item.title: Best Mattress 2025: We’ve Tested 100+ so You Can Sleep Soundly
item.description: WIRED has tested 100+ bed-in-a-box mattresses for a week each. Our top pick, the Helix Midnight Luxe hybrid, is the best bed you can buy online.
